metadata.author: test
metadata.description: Check whether a user opened/executed a malicious file or not.

GoogleChronicleBackstory.Rules(val.ruleI.ruleText:
rule email_execution {
  meta:
    author = "test"
    description = "Check whether a user opened/executed a malicious file or not."
    severity = "High"

  events:
    $email_event.metadata.event_type = "EMAIL_TRANSACTION"
    $email_event.about.file.mime_type = /^(com|exe|bat|cmd|cpl|jar|js|msi|rar|reg|der|fxp|gadget|hpj|inf|ins|isp|its|jse|ksh|lnk|mad|maf|mag|mam|maq|mar|mas|mat|mau|mav|maw|mda|mdb|mde|mdt|mdw|mdz|msc|msh|msh1|msh2|mshxml|msh1xml|msh2xml|msp|mst|ops|osd|pcd|plg|prf|prg|shs|ps1xml|ps2|ps2xml|psc1|psc2|tmp|url|vb|vbe|vbp|vsmacros|vsw|ws|wsc|wsh|xnk|ade|cla|class|grp|mcf|ocx|pl|xbap|pst|scf|sct|shb)$/
    $email_event.about.file.sha256 = $sha256

    // re.regex($edr_event.target.process.file.full_path, `^(C:\\Users\\.*)|(.*\\Local\\Temp\\.*)$`)
    $edr_event.target.process.file.sha256 = $sha256

  match:
    $sha256 over 48h

  condition:
    $email_event and $edr_event
}
